mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam.salary ( month, basic, allowance, reward, insurance, gongJiJin, money, userId ) VALUES ( #{month}, #{basic}, #{allowance}, #{reward}, #{insurance}, #{gongJiJin}, #{money}, #{userId} );
mapper.update: UPDATE exam.salary SET month = #{month}, basic = #{basic}, allowance = #{allowance}, reward = #{reward}, insurance = #{insurance}, gongJiJin = #{gongJiJin}, money = #{money}, userId = #{userId} WHERE salary.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM exam.salary ORDER BY id
